headline: Cabbage Jambalaya
name: Cabbage Jambalaya
description: An easy recipe that will have the kids eating cabbage like it's going out of style! Ground beef and sausage are simmered together with tomatoes, onion, celery, cabbage and rice.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound smoked sausage, cut into 1/4-inch slices
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ground beef, smoked sausage, onion, celery, and garlic in a large stock pot over medium-high heat. Cook and stir until beef is evenly browned, about 5 minutes. Stir in cabbage, tomatoes, water, and rice. Season with garlic salt.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low. Cover and cook, stirring once, until rice is tender, 35 to 40 minutes.
